post.text: Listen in from Johnstown, Pennsylvania as Hillary and Tim Kaine discuss innovation and manufacturing.

comment.author: Justin
comment.text: Hillary has been demonized for her entire career, but the truth is that she's a reasonable candidate who thinks through the issues before making a decision. That's the only kind of person I want to be President.

replies.author: William
replies.text: Yep like watching from a drone while four Amercians died while protecting other Americans. Don't the BEGGED for help. But that was not her ball to carry.

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: William - STOP please educate yourself as you look/sound extremely STUPID! Typical Drumpf supporter - how sad for you! :(

replies.author: Seth
replies.text: Tyler You need to educate yourself because you flunked history class. The facts of the crimes she made are out there. Look them up yourself. Besides, her husband was 1 out of the 2 presidents who were impeached.
